text: 10.7: Dan 9.6; 9.10; Amo 3.7; Ro 16.25-26; VB 11.15Mba harathɨgi enser wo mbarɨva berarga, ana khɨkhɨm hɨrga, Fhe Bakɨme mba muun za suaŋgi bigeŋ, ne zorga ki, Fhe Bakɨme nen muuŋgirim, ne guigira hɨgɨrga. Ana fhum mba bigen won kamthooŋ gumgi, mbe anan ŋaara mbui, ana nen mbe suaŋgim, mbe ne bun suaŋgi.”
